definition: International Mathematical Olympiad (IMO)/abbr. for 國際奧林匹克數學競賽|国际奥林匹克数学竞赛[Guo2 ji4 Ao4 lin2 pi3 ke4 Shu4 xue2 Jing4 sai4]
Austria/Austrian/abbr. for 奧地利|奥地利[Ao4 di4 li4]/Olympic/Olympics/abbr. for 奧林匹克|奥林匹克[Ao4 lin2 pi3 ke4]
to count/to count as/to regard as/to enumerate (sb's shortcomings)

sentences.english: She also taught me five math problems this evening.
sentences.chinese: 今天晚上，她還教了我五道奧數題。

sentences.english: Then she taught me five Olympian math problems.
sentences.chinese: 接着，她教了我五道奧數題。

sentences.english: Solution of oersted of number problem is also regular.
sentences.chinese: 解答奧數題也是有規律可循的。

sentences.english: She just spent the whole night in learning Olympiad Mathematical by herself.
sentences.chinese: 她就自學了一晚上的奧數。

sentences.english: Third, I spent some time in teaching my daughter how to work out the Olympiad mathematics problems.
sentences.chinese: 第三，我還花了一些時間教我女兒做奧數題。

sentences.english: I just teach her several Internationale Mathematik-Olympiade problems for second grade.
sentences.chinese: 我就教了她幾道小學二年級的奧數題。

sentences.english: This article has made a preliminary study on the methodology and techniques of the Olympics mathematics proposition.
sentences.chinese: 本文就奧數命題的方法和技巧作了初步研究。

sentences.english: It is the last topic for her Olympian math book.
sentences.chinese: 那是她那本奧數書的最後一講了。

sentences.english: Then she taught me other five Olympian math problems.
sentences.chinese: 接着她又教了我另外的五道奧數題。

sentences.english: So she spent the whole night in learning Mathematical Olympiad by herself.
sentences.chinese: 因此，她整個晚上都在自學奧數。

sentences.english: There are 35 topics in the Olympiad Mathematics book.
sentences.chinese: 在那本奧數書中共有三十五講。

sentences.english: And she spent one hour and a half in learning Mathematical Olympiad.
sentences.chinese: 她花了一個半的小時在學習奧數。

sentences.english: My daughter finished the Olympiad Mathematics book for grade four last Sunday.
sentences.chinese: 上個星期天，我女兒做完了那本四年級奧數題。

sentences.english: My daughter finished one module's math exercises this morning.
sentences.chinese: 今天早上，我女兒做完了一個模塊的奧數題。

sentences.english: Oersted of number also is such.

definition: student of a senior high school
excelling both in morals and studies (idiom); top marks for studies and for behavior (at school)/a paragon of virtue and learning
Ruyuan Yao Autonomous County in Shaoguan 韶關|韶关[Shao2 guan1], Guangdong

pinyin: Bei3 jing1 Di4 er4 Wai4 guo2 yu3 Xue2 yuan4

definition: all-round education (contrasted with 應試教育|应试教育[ying4 shi4 jiao4 yu4], exam-oriented education)
